alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Houston, northeastern Jackson, northwestern Seminole and southwestern Early Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 437 PM EDT/337 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Cottonwood, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Ashford, Cowarts, Malone, Avon, Gordon, Jakin, Bascom, Saffold, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Enon, Wilson Mill, Riverturn, Hornsville, Steam Mill, Howards Mill and Lovetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
